section.markdown:
**This data is currently published using the ONS Data Explorer.**

The most recent data have been published via this tool, links to view the datasets are provided below. Any feedback would be appreciated.

- [UKBAA01a-Enterprise/local units by 4 Digit SIC and UK Regions][1] 

- [UKBAA01b-Enterprise/local units by Broad Industry Group and UK Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][2] 

- [UKBAA03-Enterprise/local units by Industry and Parliamentary Constituency][4] 

- [UKBABa-Enterprise/local units by 2 Digit SIC, Employment size band and Region][5] 

- [UKBABb-Enterprise/local units by 4 Digit SIC and Employment size band][6] 

- [UKBAC-Enterprise/local units by Industry, Employment size band and Legal status][7] 

- [UKBAD01-Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and UK Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][8] 

- [UKBAD03-Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and Parliamentary Constituency][10] 

- [UKBAE-Enterprise/local units by Employment size band, Legal status and Region][11] 

- [UKBAF01-Enterprise by Turnover size band and UK Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][12] 

- [UKBAF03-Enterprise by Turnover size band and Parliamentary Constituency][14] 

- [UKBAGa-Enterprise by 2 Digit SIC, Turnover size band and Region][15] 

- [UKBAGb-Enterprise by 4 Digit SIC and Turnover size band][16] 

- [UKBAH-Enterprise by Turnover size band, Legal status and Region][17] 

- [UKBAI-Enterprise by Industry, Turnover size band and Legal status][18] 


###2015 Data

[UKBAA02-Enterprise/local units by Industry and Northern Ireland Local Authority Districts][3] 

[UKBAD02-Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and Northern Ireland Local Authority Districts][9] 

[UKBAF02-Enterprise by Turnover size band and Northern Ireland Local Authority Districts][13] 

###2014 Data

[UKBA01a - Enterprise/local units by 4 Digit SIC and UK Regions][19]

[UKBA01b - Enterprise/local units by Broad Industry Group and GB Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][20]

[UKBA02 - Enterprise/local units by Industry and Northern Ireland Local Authority Districts][21]

[UKBA03 - Enterprise/local units by Industry and Parliamentary Constituency][22]

[UKBBa - Enterprise/local units by 2 Digit SIC, Employment size band and Region][23]Â  

[UKBBb - Enterprise/local units by 4 Digit SIC and Employment size band][24] 

[UKBC - Enterprise/local units by Industry, Employment size band and Legal status][25] 

[UKBD01 - Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and GB Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][26]

[UKBD02 - Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and Northern Ireland Local Authority DistrictS][27]

[UKBD03 - Enterprise/local units by Employment size band and Parliamentary Constituency][28]

[UKBE - Enterprise/local units by Employment size band, Legal status and Region][29]

[UKBF01 - Enterprise by Turnover size band and GB Local Authority Districts (including UK total)][30]

[UKBF02 - Enterprise by Turnover size band and Northern Ireland Local Authority Districts][31]

[UKBF03 - Enterprise by Turnover size band and Parliamentary Constituency][32] 

[UKBGa - Enterprise by 2 Digit SIC, Turnover size band and Region][33]

[UKBGb - Enterprise by 4 Digit SIC and Turnover size band][34]

[UKBH - Enterprise by Turnover size band, Legal status and Region][35]

[UKBI - Enterprise by Industry, Turnover size band and Legal status][36]

description.title: UK Business - Activity, Size and Location
description.summary: The dataset contains data on local units and enterprises by geography, industry, legal status and employment size band. There are additional data at enterprise level by turnover size band.
description.metaDescription: The dataset contains data on local units and enterprises by geography, industry, legal status and employment size band. There are additional data at enterprise level by turnover size band.
